channel.title: Alex Richey | Blog
channel.description: Software engineer based in Seattle, WA. I write about politics and code.

item.title: Why I Could Be Wrong
item.description: I maintain that there's always a possibility that, for almost anything I currently believe, it could be false.

item.title: Error Handling in Go REST APIs
item.description: A pattern for distinguishing and handling client and internal errors in Go that leverages the power of Go's interfaces.

item.title: Posterity
